Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Halsted
ShortDescription: Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temp rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding Change at Western
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays while we repair a track condition near Western; board all trains on the Forest Park-bound side at Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays while we repair a track condition near Western.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track Kedzie-Homan and Illinois Medical District and may experience delays in this area while waiting for oncoming trains to clear.

Board all trains on the Forest Park-bound side of the platform at Western.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
